people.name: Victor L. Berger
people.description: Victor Luitpold Berger  was a founding member of the Social Democratic Party of America and its successor, the Socialist Party of America.

people.name: Thomas J. Morgan
people.description: Thomas John "Tommy" Morgan, Jr.   was an English-born American labor leader and socialist political activist.

people.name: Edward Bellamy
people.description: Edward Bellamy  was an American author and socialist, most famous for his utopian novel, Looking Backward, a tale set in the distant future of the year 2000.

people.name: Algis Budrys
people.description: Algis Budrys  was a Lithuanian-American science fiction author, editor, and critic.

people.name: Alastair Reynolds
people.description: Alastair Preston Reynolds  is a British science fiction author.

people.name: Helen Keller
people.description: Helen Adams Keller  was an American author, political activist, and lecturer.

people.name: Bruce Sterling
people.description: Michael Bruce Sterling  is an American science fiction author known for his novels and work on the Mirrorshades anthology.

people.name: Henry George
people.description: Henry George  was an American political economist, journalist, and philosopher.

people.name: James Engle
people.description: James Engle  fought in the American Revolutionary War, was a member of the Pennsylvania House of Representatives from Philadelphia County and served as speaker in 1809.

people.name: Steve Alten
people.description: Steven Robert "Steve" Alten  is an American science fiction author.
